rukus.text: Ningen ni wa, nani mo no tomo yobenai, nagai jiki ga attade wanai ka
Hontoni ware wa kare o kokoromiru tame kongo shita itteki no seieki kara ningen o tsukutta. Sorede ware wa chokaku to shikaku o kare ni sazuketa
Ware wa, ningen ni (tadashi) michi o shimeshita. Kansha suru mono (shinjiru mono) ni naru ka, shinjinai mono ni naru ka, to
Fushinjin-sha ni wa, ware wa kusari to kubikase to rekka o junbi shite oita
(Shinja no) zenkosha wa, kafuru o mazeta hai (no nomimono) o nomudearou
(Soreha) arra no shimo be-tachi ga nomu izumi no koto de, ware wa omoinomamani konkonto (izumi o) waki dasa seru
Kare-ra (zenkosha) wa chikai o hatashi, saiyaku no hirogaru hi o osorete iru
Mata kare-ra wa, kare o keiai suru tame ni, hinja to minashigo to horyo ni shokumotsu o ataeru
(Soshite iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa, arra no o yorokobi o negatte, anata gata o yashinai, anata gata ni hoshu mo kansha mo motomemasen
Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no kuju ni michita o ikarinohi o osoremasu
Sorede arra wa, sonohi no saiyaku kara kare-ra o mamori, subarashi yorokobi o atae rareru
Kare-ra ga taeshinondanode, kare wa rakuen to kinu (no i) de kare-ra ni mukuwa re
sono (rakuen no)-chu de, nedoko no ue ni yuttari to mi o nobashi, kare-ra wa kokusho no taiyo mo, koru samuke mo oboenaidearou
(Jumoku no) kokage wa kare-ra no ue o oi,(kajitsu no) bo wa tsutsumashiku tare kudaru
Gin no mizusashi to garasuno-hai wa, kare-ra no ma ni mawasa reyou
Garasu (no hai to mieta no) wa gin de tsukura rete ite, kare-ra wa konomi no ryo o sore ni mitasu
Kare-ra wa soko de, shoga o mazeta hai no nomimono o atae rareyou
Soko ni, sarusabiru to nadzuke rareru izumi ga aru
Mata eien no shonen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o 往米 Shi, anata ga kare-ra o miru to, maki chirasa reta shinjudearu to omoudearou
Anata wa shisen o mukeru to shifuku no sodaina sangoku o shitatamerudearou
Kare-ra wa utsukushi midoriiro no kinu to nishiki no soto i o matoi, gin no udewa de kazara re,-nushi wa kare-ra ni junryona nomimono o noma se rareru
Hontoni kore wa anata gata ni taisuru hoshodearu. Anata gata no doryoku ga uke haira reta nodearu.'(To ose rareyou)
